channel.title: Air-Fryer on Loving my tummy
channel.description: Recent content in Air-Fryer on Loving my tummy

item.title: Crispy gnocchi
item.description: In a bowl, add the gnocchi, spices, salt, and oil, and mix well. Place the gnocchi in the air fryer. Set the air fryer to 180-200°C (350-400°F) for 15-20 minutes. Halfway through the cooking time, shake the gnocchi to ensure even cooking. From Instagram @fussimonsi.

item.title: Garlic mushrooms
item.description: Wash and slice the mushrooms into thick slices. Mix them with garlic, parsley, chili pepper, oil, and salt. Preheat your air fryer. Cook them at 190°C (375°F) for 10 minutes (halfway through cooking, open the air fryer and stir them). From Instagram @misrecetasairfryercosori.

item.title: Quesadilla
item.description: As the main ingredient, you can use your favourite protein (chicken, turkey, tuna, salmon, etc.). Place one tortilla in the air fryer. Cover with the main ingredient (e.g., chicken) and half of the cheese, spreading them evenly. Cover with the second tortilla. Place a metal rack on top to prevent the tortilla from flying off. Set the air fryer to 190°C (375°F) for 6 minutes. Halfway through, remove the rack, flip the quesadilla, cover with the remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle with oregano.
